Container.Name: wikijs
Container.Overview: A modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app built on NodeJS, Git and Markdown
Container.DonateText: Wiki.js is an open source project that has been made possible due to the generous contributions by community backers. If you are interested in supporting this project, please consider becoming a patron or donating to our OpenCollective.

Config.Name: Database Type
Config.Description: DB_TYPE : Type of database (mysql, postgres, mariadb, mssql or sqlite)

Config.Name: Database Host
Config.Description: DB_HOST : Hostname or IP of the database

Config.Name: Database User
Config.Description: DB_USER : Username to connect to the database

Config.Name: Database Password
Config.Description: DB_PASS : Password to connect to the database

Config.Name: Optional: Database SSL
Config.Description: DB_SSL : Set to either 1 or true to enable. (optional, off if omitted)

Config.Name: DB_FILEPATH
Config.Description: For SQLite only: DB_FILEPATH : Path to the SQLite file
